articles.content:
Info Edge, which runs companies like Naukri.com, 99acres.com, and Jeevansathi,com, announced 100 percent acquisition of SaaS-based recruitment management platform Zwayam Digitals share capital.

articles.title: Does Cyberpunk 2077 Run at 'PS5-Level' in Tesla Model S Plaid? Elon Musk Says So - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Elon Musk demoed Cyberpunk 2077 running on the infotainment system of Tesla Model S Plaid during the luxury electric car's launch event. He claimed the game can run at 60FPS with a graphics performance of 'PS5-Level'.
articles.content: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said that the new Tesla Model S Plaid can play high-end games such as CD Projekt Red's Cyberpunk 2077. At an event for the new Tesla Model S Plaid, which was livestreamed, Musk sh… [+2306 chars]
